Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-33065 affecting package libsndfile for versions less than 1.2.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-33065 affecting package libsndfile for versions less than 1.2.2-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libsndfile is earlier than 1.2.2-2, affected by CVE-2022-33065
